<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>rename sys_cs_adapter_configuration_page_slack.external_id's label 
set sys_cs_adapter_configuration_page.client_type as mandatory </description>
        <name>Fix Adapter Config Dict Element</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var page = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
page.addQuery('name', 'sys_cs_adapter_configuration_page');
page.addQuery('element', 'client_type');
page.query();
if (page.next()) {
	page.setValue('mandatory', 'true');
	page.update();
}

var slackPage = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
slackPage.addQuery('name', 'sys_cs_adapter_configuration_page_slack');
slackPage.addQuery('element', 'external_id');
slackPage.query();
if (slackPage.next()) {
	slackPage.setValue('column_label', 'Workspace ID (or Enterprise ID)');
	slackPage.update();
}
	]]></script>
